source.b3489213:
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
sc = StandardScaler()
usa_copy.Price = sc.fit_transform(usa_copy.Price.values.reshape(-1,1))
source.383acb2d:
css = []
for i in range(1,11):
    clus = KMeans(n_clusters=i)
    clus.fit_transform(usa_copy.values)
    css.append(clus.inertia_)
plt.plot(range(1,11),css,marker = 'o')
